entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
